v8:item.v8:content: Search for updates on the 1C website (recommended)
Select the update file manually from a local drive
For technical details see <link SeeEventLog>event log</>.
How do I know the login and password?
Authorization failed. Please, make sure that: • the subscription is valid • the login and password are correct
Authorization failed. Please make sure that the login and password are specified correctly.
An error occurred while checking your validity.
For technical details, see event log.
Update file is not required because it is already imported into the main configuration
Panel update from the main configuration
Main configuration doesn't differ from the infobase configuration. It is recommended to update from the main configuration.
Update is not required as far as the infobase configuration is equal to the main configuration
Read the update instructions to continue.
To setup this update, 1C: Enterprise platform must be no earlier than the %1 version. Setup the newer platform and try again.
The latest version of the application is already installed.
There are no updates for this application version.
The configuration with the enabled metadata changes cannot be updated automatically. Install the update manually in the Designer mode (menu "Configuration" - "Support" - "Update configuration").
Application is updated while synchronizing data with "%1".
It may take several minutes dowload the update files, depending on the connection speed and computer performance.
Read the update instructions to continue.
Update may take a long time. Do not shutdown your computer until the process is completed.
Update is downloaded. Application restart will be required to proceed. Process of updating can take a long time. Do not shutdown the computer until the installation process is completed.
Other users are working with the application. Close their sessions to continue.
External applications are currently working with the application. Close them to continue.
The Designer application is running, close it to continue.
Create temporary infobase backup and roll back in case of errors.
Read the update instructions to continue.
Schedule update installation at the specified time
The update will be installed using this computer in the background mode. The computer must be powered on at the specified time.
Update may take a long time. Do not shutdown your computer until the process is completed.
Users are working with the infobase. Their sessions will be terminated automatically.
Users and external applications are working with infobase. Sessions will be terminated automatically.
It is recommended to create infobase backup before installing an update.
Installation of the update is successfully completed. Click Done to finish the update.
Errors occurred during the update process. See details in the event log.
Update for the next revision is available
